h2_title: Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: Be sure to stay on guard when it finally does rise, as it can easily feint into a backward slam with its armored hide.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Be sure to stay on guard when it finally does rise, as it can easily feint into a backward slam with its armored hide.
